projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Confluence Jira Automation
projects.bodyText: Python Scripts that takes certain issues from Jira using a Jira query and then creates a Confluence blog page formatting the issues for easy reading. Runs periodically using a CRON job.

projects.title: CSV Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
A Python/Streamlit Chatbot that automates the process of running aggregational queries on CSV files. It allows users to ask questions about the data in a natural language format, and the bot responds with the relevant information extracted from the CSV file.
 - Uses **Pandas** for data manipulation and **Streamlit** for the web interface.
